description: A powerful and moving work, Spartacus shows episodes from an uprising of slaves in Ancient Rome. The dramatic effects of this action are played out by those swept up in the action: Spartacus, his wife Flavia and Crassus, commander of the Roman Army. Stars Lisa Pavane and Steven Heathcote. The Australian Ballet.
